divs: sighting detailsthird observation. friends have seen before, and have photos and will send separately. blinking red, white, green and blue lights, appears to rotate. colors appear to change location. hovering for a long time, with slight southward track. appeared tonight at approx. 90 degrees east to slightly south of east of 08816- distance appx. 20-30 miles at appx. 30 degrees above horizon. maybe even as far away as ny harbor. other sightings closer to east brunswick, nj. another similarly lighted object sighted lower and further south of object 1, but lower to horizon, further away (apparently) and too close to trees and building to differentiate more. other reports to follow from others who have made repeated sightings. i have not seen object, just lights. others have seen object and have described it as whitish oval, perhaps skewed\with upward or downward angle.
Summary: Blinking white, red, green and blue lights. appears to rotate. stationary.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in East Brunswick
There were no other sightings in East Brunswick on or around September 22nd 2010
